physical_appearance:This is a baju panjang. It is printed with yellow and dark purple checked pattern
 against a dark brown background. There is a floral bouquet motif printed within each square.
subject_terms_1:flowers (motifs) Peranakan checker pattern tops (garments
 general) blouses (main garments)
subject_terms_2:Ethnic costume Motifs Peranakan (Asian people) Blouses
subject_terms_3:Peranakan costumes
subject_terms_4:Baju Panjang
sgcool_label_text:The baju panjang is printed with yellow and dark purple checks against a dark brown background
 with a floral bouquet motif within each square. It is lined with panels of linen on the inside. Block-printed batik cotton like this was popular in the Straits Settlements in the late 19th-early 20th century. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
